description: Mr. Smith, full name John Smith, is a CIA agent who makes contact with Madam Oreille in regards to finding out what happened to Hei after going rogue against the CIA when he went to hide in Japan. He later leads the American takeover of Tokyo and Hell`s Gate to secure the United State`s technological dominance. However, he is apparently killed by an unknown doll that resembles Yin with short hair.
name: John Smith
